data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Sfax, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sfax, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Sfax, Tunisia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Sfax, Tunisia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Sfax, Tunisia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people.
There are 955,400 people living in the state of Sfax. Only about 284 might be believers.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Sfax, Tunisia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sfax, Tunisia has a population of 955,400.

We estimate Sfax has 284 people who might know Jesus, 4,005 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 951,111 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,364 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 284 believers in Sfax to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
